title: Freedom Monument and Riga Brethren Cemetery Law

items.title: Section 9. Showing Disrespect Towards the Freedom Monument or Riga Brethren Cemetery
items.text: For showing blatant disrespect towards the Freedom Monument or Riga Brethren Cemetery, a fine shall be imposed on a natural person from 200 to 400 units of fine (from 1000 to 2000 euros).

items.title: Section 11. Administrative Procedure
items.text: Administrative offence proceedings for offences referred to in Sections 9 and 10 of this Law shall be conducted by the State Police and municipal police.
